t: Amazon Added Brand Stores to Search - Marketplace Pulse
s: August 20, 2020 - Amazon is testing a change to its search suggestions that adds a link to the related brand's store page. Branded searches like "adidas" have "adidas store on amazon" as an option. Crucially, unbranded searches like "men's running shoes" also have a suggested brand store.

t: Only 22% of Searches on Amazon Include a Brand Name - Marketplace Pulse
s: July 1, 2019 - More than three-quarters of Amazon searches are unbranded, seeking for generic products rather than name brands. Search terms highlight how Amazon shoppers' behavior is shifted from a brand-driven world observed elsewhere to a needs-based decision process.

t: Amazon Private Label Brands - Marketplace Pulse
s: March 18, 2019 - According to Marketplace Pulse research, Amazon-owned private label brands are not nearly as successful as many paint them to be. Amazon has been successful in creating generic items at low prices, but only when using the Amazon brand name (i.e., AmazonBasics and Amazon Essentials).
